articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Apple AirPods get new features, including studio-quality audio and a camera remote, at WWDC 2025 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple's AirPods are getting a couple of new features and gestures, the Cupertino-based tech company announced at its Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) on Monday.
articles.content:
Apple’s AirPods are getting a couple of new features and gestures, the Cupertino-based tech company announced at its WWDC 2025 event on Monday.
While leaks suggested more gestures and other addition… [+941 chars]

articles.title: Full-screen Xbox handheld UI is coming to all Windows PCs “starting next year” - Ars Technica
articles.description: Microsoft has been experimenting with “handheld mode” for Windows 11 since 2022.

articles.author: Zack Whittaker
articles.title: Major US grocery distributor warns of disruption after cyberattack - TechCrunch
articles.description: UNFI, a grocery distributor for Whole Foods and others, warned of disruptions to customer orders after a cyberattack.
articles.content: United Natural Foods (UNFI), a major distributor of groceries to Whole Foods and other retailers, said on Monday that it was hit by a cyberattack, warning of disruptions to its ability to fulfill and… [+1935 chars]
